Class JacksonConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.jackson.JacksonConfiguration

  • @ConfigurationProperties(value="jackson")
public class JacksonConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration for the Jackson JSON parser.

    1.0
    Author:
